entries.title: Adult Swim drops Justin Roiland from Rick & Morty after domestic violence charges
entries.description: "Rick and Morty will continue."

entries.title: FBI says North Korean hackers responsible for $100M Harmony Horizon Bridge crypto heist
entries.description: The hacker group used "social engineering of victims" in the Harmony hack.

entries.title: Call of Duty: Warzone 2 is slowly turning back into Warzone 1
entries.description: Infinity Ward is undoing key Warzone changes in a bid to win back players.

entries.title: Complaints about Cyberpunk 2077 being too linear are 'completely justified' says quest director
entries.description: "I would expect more from us, from myself, and from us as a studio," CDPR's Pawel Sasko said.

entries.title: Titanfall 2 now costs less than a Big Mac, its lowest ever price on Steam
entries.description: If you've been waiting to pick up Titanfall 2, wait no longer, because it's now on sale for just three bucks.

entries.title: Overwatch 2 is questioning if one-shot kills belong, starting with Roadhog
entries.description: Smart changes to Sojourn and Roadhog suggest Blizzard is reconsidering one-shot kills

entries.title: Blizzard is sounding out how much players will pay for a Hearthstone subscription
entries.description: A user survey hints at a subscription service for full access to cards, while 3D gameplay and a player-to-player marketplace are also mentioned.

entries.title: Fatshark pauses Darktide content updates as it apologizes botched launch
entries.description: The studio said it will spend the next few months focusing exclusively on player feedback and complaints.

entries.title: Whoops! The latest Destiny 2 hotfix deleted a bunch of incredibly hard-to-earn achievements
entries.description: The game is now offline while Bungie works out how to extinguish this particular fire.

entries.title: 16 games we think could be surprise hits in 2023
entries.description: If these games aren't already on your radar, they should be.

entries.title: Forspoken demo is now on PC
entries.description: Find out how Square Enix's controversial new game runs on your rig.

entries.title: Why Tiger Woods' golf ball is a grenade, and other amazing videogame trivia
entries.description: A viral tweet unleashed a flood of oddities.

entries.title: Dungeons & Dragons' OGL isn't worth fighting for
entries.description: Wizards of the Coast is forcing fans into a struggle for the future of the game—but you don't have to play by its rules

entries.title: Metro Exodus' Ukrainian devs release full modding toolkit in first update since war began
entries.description: "Some days start with our morning stand-ups and a coffee. But some start with air-raid sirens and missile strikes".

entries.title: How to eliminate a player with no ranged weapons in Fortnite
entries.description: Throw away your firearms for this weekly challenge.

entries.title: Riot says it won't pay ransom after League of Legends source code stolen by hackers
entries.description: The source for Teamfight Tactics and an anticheat platform were also taken in a "social engineering attack" last week.

entries.title: Everyone's favorite sandbox murder-fest is getting Nvidia's Frame Generation magic
entries.description: Hitman 3 and Midnight Suns are getting the DLSS 3 treatment later this week, just in time for their DLC.

entries.title: Even for Apple $3,000 is a lot to charge for what's looking like some pretty standard VR
entries.description: However pretty the "realistic avatars" an exclusive Bloomberg report details actually end up being.

entries.title: 'Honestly, this sucks,' says Chess.com as its servers can't keep up with Chess's explosive popularity
entries.description: The game of kings remains as fascinating as ever in the computer era.

entries.title: This indie adventure has you playing the hapless security guard from every horror movie
entries.description: Interference: Dead Air is like The Stanley Parable meets Security Booth meets Welcome to Nightvale.

entries.title: 'A spit in the face of every translator who worked tirelessly on the project'—Persona 3 and 4 localisers aren't in the credits
entries.description: "The least we can do is credit them".

entries.title: The team behind Desperados 3 and Shadow Tactics wants you to lead an undead pirate crew to riches and glory

entries.title: OpenAI's ChatGPT Pro ain't gonna be cheap
entries.description: OpenAI is likely to come out with a pretty darn expensive paid version of one of the most popular AI text generation platforms on the web.

entries.title: I think AMD needs to stop letting interns update its upcoming CPU info pages
entries.description: Whole lotta mistakes going on.

entries.title: Swearing rats mod for Oblivion puts its vermin in permanent meltdown mode

entries.title: Blizzard fires WoW Classic lead after he protests employee evaluation policy

entries.title: Anarchist hacker exposes the TSA's 1.5 million-name no-fly list
